addNetworks.title: Fa Networks Ka Wo Wallet Ho
addNetworks.description: Klik network biara de fa ka MetaMask, Rabby anaa Web3 wallet foforo ho

addNetwork.connectWallet: Fa wo wallet bɔ mu kane
addNetwork.error: Antumi amfa network anka ho. Bɔ mmɔden fa ka ho wɔ wo nsa so.

networkWarning.title: Network Foforo
networkWarning.message: Wobɛtumi asesa tokens wɔ BSC Chain nkoa so. Kɔ BSC so na sesa wo tokens tete.

confirmModal.title: Gye Nsesae No Tom
confirmModal.warning: Worebɛsesa wo tokens. Yɛsrɛ wo, kenkan nea edidi so yi yie ansa na woakɔ so.
confirmModal.irreversible: Sɛ woyɛ wei a, wontumi nsesa no bio!
confirmModal.burnExplanation: Wɔbɛhyew wo {{legacySymbol}} tokens no koraa na wɔbɛ mint {{newSymbol}} tokens dodow koro no ara akɔ wo wallet mu. Wontumi nsan nsakra eyi.
confirmModal.positiveNote: Nea ɛyɛ: {{newSymbol}} nni tax biara — tax a ɛboro 10%+ biara nni transaction biara so bio.

finalConfirmModal.title: Woadi Woho Ni?
finalConfirmModal.message: Eyi ne bere a etwa to a wobɛtumi agyae. Sɛ wogye tom a, wɔbɛsesa {{legacySymbol}} akɔ {{newSymbol}} na wontumi nsesa mma no mmra akyi bio.

bridge.noBridgeableTokens: Token biara nni hɔ a yɛde bɛtwa mu
bridge.addTokenError: Antumi amfa token ankɔ wallet mu
bridge.historyStoredLocally: Wɔkora abakɔsɛm wɔ wo kɔmputa yi so nkoa

settings.title: Nhyehyɛe
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Sesa RPC URL a wɔde di dwuma wɔ network biara so.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Wɔnhyehyɛɛ network biara wɔ tebea yi mu.

banner.title: Wofoforo ha?
banner.message: Sua Freedom Bridge ho na hu sɛnea wobɛtumi de TigerOG tokens akɔ networks foforo so.
banner.note: Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ wosesa tokens a, wontumi nsan annya wo sika no bio.

hero.title: Gye Wo <1/> <2>Agyapadeɛ</2> Ahofadi
hero.subtitle: Fa TigerOG tokens kɔ networks foforo so a ɛyɛ mmerɛ denam Axelar Interchain Token Service so. Ahobammɔ wɔ mu, ɛyɛ ntɛm, na toɔ nni mu.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge fa Axelar ITS di dwuma de ma wo betumi de tokens atwa blockchain {{count}}+ so a ahobammɔ wɔ mu na toɔ nni mu.

stopDecay.title: Gyae Sika Ho Ahwerase
stopDecay.description: Tokens tete hyew wo sika 10-11% sɛ wotɔ anaa wotɔn a. Sesa kɔ TigerOG mu na wo sika nyinaa bɛtena hɔ.

conversion.title: 1:1 Nsesae
conversion.description: Sika dodow no nsesa da. 1:1 pɛpɛɛpɛ na wɔde di dwuma. Inflation nni hɔ, dilution nni hɔ.

multichain.title: Networks Pii
multichain.description: Yɛ no pɛnkoro, fa di dwuma baabiara. Wo token bɛyɛ adwuma wɔ Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, ne nea ɛkeka ho.

security.title: Axelar Ahobammɔ
security.description: Axelar validators a wɔahyɛ da na ɛhwɛ so. ITS hwɛ sɛ wo tokens bɛkɔ baabi a wopɛ no wɔ ahobammɔ mu.

cta.title: Woayɛ krado?
cta.description: Fa wo ho bɔ interchain revolution no. Ɛgye miniti baako pɛ na woasesa wo tokens na woatumi de atwa mu wɔ Axelar so.

buyTokens.title: Nya Tokens
buyTokens.description: Wonni tokens bi? Kɔ tɔ tokens tete wɔ PancakeSwap so, na sesa wɔn kɔ tokens foforo a ɛkɔ networks pii so mu.

header.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ
header.subtitle: Sua sɛnea wobɛsesa tokens tete na wode atwa networks foforo so.

whatIs.title: Deɛn ne Freedom Bridge?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge yɛ protocol a wɔde boa ma wobɛtumi asesa tokens tete akɔ tokens foforo a toɔ nni mu na wobɛtumi de akɔ blockchain biara so. Ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) so.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Tokens tete wɔ 10%+ toɔ. TigerOG tokens wɔ 0% toɔ.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Fa wo sika kɔ blockchain {{count}}+ so ntɛm wɔ Axelar so.

howToConvert.title: Sɛnea Wobɛsesa Tokens
howToConvert.step1: Fa wo wallet bɔ network a wode refi aseɛ no (sɛ BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step3: Yi token tete a wopɛ sɛ wosesa no.
howToConvert.step4: Ma Conversion contract kwan sɛ ɛmfa wo tokens ndi dwuma.
howToConvert.step5: Klik Sesa na woanya TigerOG tokens a ɛne nea wode bae no yɛ pɛ.
howToConvert.note: Hyɛ no nsow: Sɛ wo token tete gye toɔ a, wobɛtua toɔ no bere a woresa no. Nanso woasesa wie a, toɔ biara nni mu bio.

supportedNetworks.title: Networks a Yɛboa
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge boa blockchain {{count}}+ a ɛrekɔ anim, na ɛma wobɛtumi de tokens akɔ baabiara wɔ Axelar so.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokens
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ma wobɛtumi de tokens akɔ networks pii so a address no yɛ baako na sika dodow no yɛ pɛ. Freedom Bridge fa ITS di dwuma de hwɛ sɛ TigerOG bɛyɛ adwuma baabiara a wode bɛkɔ.

axelar.title: Axelar Network
axelar.content: Yɛde Axelar di dwuma de ka blockchains ahorow bom. Axelar yɛ network a ɛnyɛ mfinimfini a ɛma sika ne nsɛm bɛtumi atwa networks pii so wɔ ahobammɔ mu.

conversion.title: Sɛnea Nsesae No Yɛ Adwuma
conversion.content: Conversion contract no wɔ BSC so. Sɛ wosesa a, wɔde wo tokens tete kɔ dead address (wɔhyew no koraa) na wonya TigerOG 1:1. Eyi yɛ akwantu baako — wo tokens tete no asɛe na wontumi nnya bio.

security.title: Ahobammɔ
security.content: Ahobammɔ wɔ Freedom Bridge mu baabiara:
security.point1: Conversion Architecture: Wɔhyew tokens tete koraa wɔ smart contracts a wɔahwehwɛ mu na wontumi nsesa mu.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: Axelar validators hwɛ nsɛm a ɛtwa networks ntam so.
security.point3: Sika Dodow a Ɛnsesa: ITS hwɛ sɛ sika dodow no bɛyɛ pɛ wɔ networks nyinaa so.
security.point4: Koodu a Wɔahwehwɛ Mu: Wɔde Axelar ne OpenZeppelin a yɛn nyinaa nim na ɛyɛe.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Wobɛtumi ahwehwɛ sika dodow yi nyinaa wɔ blockchain no so:

tigerogSupply.title: TigerOG Sika Dodow
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG wɔ sika dodow a ɛnsesa a efi BNBTiger token no mu. Yɛabu tokens a wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu nyinaa.
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens a wɔde kɔɔ 0x000...dEaD no wɔahyew no koraa. Wontumi nsan nnya da. BNBTiger toɔ mechanism no hyew nea ɛka ho.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Tokens kakraa bi si BNBTiger contract no mu. Yɛntumi mfa nni dwuma.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool no wɔ BNBTiger tokens ne BNB. Sɛ wɔhyew LP tokens (wɔde kɔ dead address) a, tokens a ɛwɔ pool no mu no to mu daa.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ɛno nti, 86.18% wɔ LP no mu no wɔato mu daa
tigerogSupply.note: Hyɛ no nsow: TigerOG ne BNBTiger yɛ 1:1 pɛpɛɛpɛ. TigerOG a ɛredidi adwuma no ne BNBTiger a ɛredidi adwuma nokware no yɛ pɛ.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Yɛbui eyi wɔ mfiase. BNBTiger tete no kɔ so hyew tokens wɔ tɔ/tɔn biara mu, enti nea ɛredidi adwuma no bɛtumi asuane kakra.

lionogSupply.title: LionOG Sika Dodow
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG wɔ sika dodow a ɛnsesa a efi BNBLion token no mu. Yɛabu tokens a wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu nyinaa.
lionogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens a wɔde kɔɔ 0x000...dEaD no wɔahyew no koraa. Wontumi nsan nnya da. BNBLion toɔ mechanism no hyew nea ɛka ho.
lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Tokens kakraa bi si BNBLion contract no mu. Yɛntumi mfa nni dwuma.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool no wɔ BNBLion tokens ne BNB. Sɛ wɔhyew LP tokens (wɔde kɔ dead address) a, tokens a ɛwɔ pool no mu no to mu daa.
lionogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ɛno nti, 99.98% wɔ LP no mu no wɔato mu daa
lionogSupply.note: Hyɛ no nsow: LionOG ne BNBLion yɛ 1:1 pɛpɛɛpɛ. LionOG a ɛredidi adwuma no ne BNBLion a ɛredidi adwuma nokware no yɛ pɛ.
lionogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Yɛbui eyi wɔ mfiase. BNBLion tete no kɔ so hyew tokens wɔ tɔ/tɔn biara mu, enti nea ɛredidi adwuma no bɛtumi asuane kakra.

frogogSupply.title: FrogOG Sika Dodow
frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG wɔ sika dodow a ɛnsesa a efi BNBFrog token no mu. Yɛabu tokens a wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu nyinaa.
frogogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens a wɔde kɔɔ 0x000...dEaD no wɔahyew no koraa. Wontumi nsan nnya da. BNBFrog toɔ mechanism no hyew nea ɛka ho.
frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Tokens kakraa bi si BNBFrog contract no mu. Yɛntumi mfa nni dwuma.
frogogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool no wɔ BNBFrog tokens ne BNB. Sɛ wɔhyew LP tokens (wɔde kɔ dead address) a, tokens a ɛwɔ pool no mu no to mu daa.
frogogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Ɛno nti, 99.31% wɔ LP no mu no wɔato mu daa
frogogSupply.note: Hyɛ no nsow: FrogOG ne BNBFrog yɛ 1:1 pɛpɛɛpɛ. FrogOG a ɛredidi adwuma no ne BNBFrog a ɛredidi adwuma nokware no yɛ pɛ.
frogogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Yɛbui eyi wɔ mfiase. BNBFrog tete no kɔ so hyew tokens wɔ tɔ/tɔn biara mu, enti nea ɛredidi adwuma no bɛtumi asuane kakra.

header.title: Smart Contracts
header.subtitle: Addresses a wɔde tokens ne bridges ahyehyɛ wɔ Freedom Bridge mu.

interchainTokens.title: Interchain Tokens
interchainTokens.description: Tokens a wɔde ahyehyɛ wɔ Axelar ITS so. Wɔn address yɛ baako wɔ networks nyinaa so.

axelarNetwork.title: Axelar Network
axelarNetwork.description: Protocol a ɛhwɛ sɛ sika bɛtwa networks ntam wɔ ahobammɔ mu.

conversionContracts.title: Conversion Contracts
conversionContracts.description: Contracts a ɛsesa tokens tete kɔ interchain tokens mu. Wɔyɛ adwuma wɔ BSC so.

conversionContractsTable.title: Conversion Contract Addresses
conversionContractsTable.subtitle: Contracts yi wɔ BSC so na wɔsesa tokens tete kɔ interchain tokens mu.

liquidityPools.title: Liquidity Pools
liquidityPools.description: DEX liquidity pools a wobɛtumi atɔn OG tokens wɔ networks ahorow so.

liquidityPoolsTable.title: Liquidity Pools
liquidityPoolsTable.subtitle: DEX pools ma OG tokens tɔn

faq.title: Freedom Bridge Mmoa
faq.subtitle: Mmuae ma nsɛm a nnipa taa bisa fa TigerOG, sika a ɛtwa mu, ne Axelar ho.

cta.title: Wowɔ nsɛm foforo?
cta.description: Fa wo ho bɔ yɛn community wɔ Telegram so anaa hwɛ Wiki no ma nsɛm pii.

questions.q1: Adɛn nti na mesesa me tokens?
questions.a1: Sɛ wosesa wo tokens kɔ TigerOG mu a, toɔ (taa yɛ 10-12%) a ɛwɔ token tete no ho no fi hɔ. Afei wobɛtumi de tokens yi akɔ blockchains foforo te sɛ Ethereum ne Base so wɔ Axelar so.
questions.a2: Aane. Protocol no fa Conversion contract a ahobammɔ wɔ mu ne Axelar Interchain Token Service di dwuma. Sɛ wosesa a, wɔhyew wo BNBTiger koraa na wonya TigerOG 1:1. Eyi hwɛ sɛ sika dodow no bɛyɛ pɛ wɔ networks nyinaa so.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge nnye sika biara wɔ nsesae no ho. Wotua blockchain gas fees a ɛwɔ hɔ dada nkoa. Sɛ wode sika refi network baako kɔ foforo so a, wotua cross-chain gas fee ma Axelar.
questions.a4: TigerOG tokens yɛ ERC20 tokens pɛpɛɛpɛ. Sɛ wo wallet yera a, wontumi nnya sika no bio. Kora wo private keys ne recovery phrases so yie.
questions.q5: Mɛtumi asan de TigerOG akɔ BNBTiger mu?
questions.a5: Dabi. Nsesae yi kɔ anim nkoa, ɛnsan akyi. Sɛ wosesa BNBTiger kɔ TigerOG mu a, wɔhyew wo BNBTiger no koraa. Wɔyɛɛ no saa na TigerOG adi token tete a toɔ wɔ mu no anammu koraa.
questions.a6: Yɛboa EVM networks pii wɔ Axelar so — BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, ne nea ɛkeka ho. Hwɛ Wiki no ma nyinaa.
questions.a7: Bere a ɛgye no gyina network a wode refi aseɛ no ne Axelar so. Taa ɛgye miniti 2-5.
questions.q8: OG tokens sika dodow yɛ sɛn?
questions.a8: OG token biara wɔ sika dodow a ɛnsesa a efi BNB token tete mu, a wɔabu nea wɔahyew, nea ɛsi contract mu, ne LP a wɔato mu. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62%). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33%). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86%). Hwɛ Wiki no ma nsɛm pii.
questions.q9: Adɛn nti na wɔnyɛɛ renounce ma OG contract no?
questions.a9: Sɛ yɛyɛ renounce ma contract no a, yɛntumi nyɛ nsesae anaa mfa networks foforo nka ho bio. Ɛwom sɛ yɛremfa contract no mma obiara seesei, nanso ɛho hia nsaano pii ansa na yɛatumi ayɛ nsesae biara. Afei, yɛmmaa kwan mmaa team no nnye tokens anaa toɔ biara.
questions.q10: Adɛn nti na yɛbɛtumi ayɛ minting ma OG contract no?
questions.a10: Cross-chain bridging hia mint/burn — wɔhyew tokens sɛ ɛrefi network bi so, na wɔyɛ mint sɛ ɛredu network foforo so. Eyi ma sika dodow no yɛ pɛ wɔ networks nyinaa so. Multisig Safe wallet na ɛhwɛ minting no so.
questions.q11: So TigerOG refi BNB Chain akɔ Axelar?
questions.a11: Dabi. Axelar nyɛ blockchain — ɛyɛ bridging protocol a ɛka networks bom. BNB Chain da so yɛ origin chain a wosesa tokens tete wɔ so. Axelar ma kwan ma wo tokens tumi kɔ BNB, Ethereum, Base ne networks foforo so.
questions.a12: Hwɛ sɛ woafa network ne token address aka wo wallet ho. Wobɛhu contract addresses nyinaa wɔ Contracts page no so. Tiger team no de Rabby wallet na ɛdi dwuma, ɛboa ma networks pii yɛ mmerɛ.
questions.q13: Adɛn nti na bridging a efi Ethereum anaa Base kyɛ saa?
questions.a13: Ethereum hia epochs mmienu ansa na agye atom koraa ma ahobammɔ. Esiane sɛ Base yɛ settlement wɔ Ethereum so nti, ɛno nso kyɛ. Eyi yɛ ma ahobammɔ — wo tokens wɔ safe, nya abotare.
questions.q14: Sɛ mehyɛ me token tete mu na mansesa nso ɛ?
questions.a14: Ɛnyɛ nhyɛ sɛ wosesa. BNBTiger ne TigerOG benya liquidity pools, market cap ne nea ɛkeka ho a ɛyɛ soronko. Nanso BNBTiger wɔ toɔ kɛse, na TigerOG nni toɔ biara. Esiane sɛ yɛmfa toɔ no nyɛ adwuma mma project no nti, CTO team no na ɛyɛ development ma TigerOG. Freedom Bridge ne multi-chain yɛ ma TigerOG nkoa.
questions.q15: Toɔ wɔ hɔ ma nsesae? So TigerOG wɔ toɔ?
questions.a15: Dabi. Wotua gas fee nkoa na wode asesa na woatɔn. Toɔ biara nni ho, na TigerOG nni toɔ biara.
questions.q16: Mɛtumi atɔ na matɔn TigerOG seesei?
questions.a16: Ennya nyɛe. Team no nnyee toɔ biara a wɔde bɛyɛ liquidity pools akɛse. Sɛ wopɛ TigerOG seesei a, gye sɛ wotɔ anaa wowɔ nea ɛwɔ hɔ dada no na woasesa. Sɛ wonya TigerOG a, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛtɔn kosi sɛ investors bɛba abɛyɛ liquidity.
questions.q17: Adɛn nti na TigerOG market cap yɛ kɛse saa?
questions.a17: Sɛ liquidity pool yɛ ketewa a, trade ketewa biara tumi sesa market cap no kɛse. Sɛ investors ba bɛyɛ liquidity providers a, ɛbɛyɛ yie.
questions.a18: Freedom Bridge nyɛɛ third-party audit biara. Nanso, converter contract code no gyina SHx converter a Stronghold team (XRP ne Stellar developers dedaw) yɛe no so. Axelar na ɛhwɛ bridging infrastructure no so, na wɔayɛ security audits pii.
questions.q19: Sɛn na Freedom Bridge bɔ ne ho ban fi hacks ho?
questions.a19:
Yɛahyehyɛ nneɛma pii:

• Converter no kura sika a ɛhia nkoa — tokens biara nni hɔ a wɔbɛtumi awia
• Converter no ntumi nyɛ mint
• Contract code nyinaa wɔ chain so na obiara tumi hwɛ
• Token permissions wɔ Safe.global multisig wallet mu
• Axelar infrastructure a yɛagye atom na ɛhwɛ bridging so
questions.q20: So bridging yɛ irreversibe? Sɛ transfer bi fail a?
questions.a20: Ɛtɔ da bi a bridge transfers tumi kyɛ esiane gas anaa network mu. Sɛ ɛba saa a, wobɛtumi ahwɛ wo transaction wɔ Axelarscan so na woafa wo nsa aka gas ho ma awie. Axelar wɔ tools a wɔde gye transactions — wo sika rempa.
questions.q21: Risks bɛn na ɛwɔ Freedom Bridge a yɛde di dwuma mu?
questions.a21: Sɛnea DeFi protocol biara te no, risks wɔ hɔ te sɛ smart contract risk, bridge risk, ne market mu nsesae. Yɛtu wo fo sɛ yɛ woara wo nhwehwɛmu (DYOR) na fa sika a wobɛtumi ahwere di dwuma. Hwɛ yɛn legal disclaimer ma nsɛm pii.
questions.q22: Mɛtumi asesa BNB Tiger Inu contract foforo (September 2025) no?
questions.a22: Dabi. Freedom Bridge boa BNB Tiger token tete a ɛbaa mfe pii a atwam no — ɛnyɛ contract foforo a wɔyɛɛ no September 2025 no. Wɔyɛɛ Freedom Bridge maa community takeover (CTO) a ɛwɔ Tiger, Lion, ne Frog tokens tete no.
questions.q23: Sɛn na mefa liquidity ka ho?
questions.a23: Liquidity a wɔde ka ho yɛ DeFi dwumadi a risks wɔ mu. Sɛ wowɔ experience wɔ liquidity a wɔde kɔ DEXs te sɛ PancakeSwap anaa Uniswap so a, ɛyɛ pɛ — fa OG token no ka base asset ho. Video yi bɛtumi aboa wo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiylIHvwMik&list=PL_ujg_v1hZ5iGtiuhT8NkSMqEOaLAgmUu
questions.q24: Team no betumi ayɛ rug pull?
questions.a24: Dabi. Ɔkwan biara nni hɔ ma rug pull. Token anaa tax biara nni hɔ a wɔde ama team no, na yɛnnye bridging fees biara — ɛno kɔ Axelar ma relaying cost. Team no yɛ holders te sɛ wo, a yɛyɛ eyi wɔ yɛn ankasa ho ka so. Wallet koro a team no wɔ yɛ marketing wallet a ɛda adi a community donations na ɛhyɛ mu. Multisig Safe wallet no na ɛkontrol contract permissions te sɛ chains a wɔde kɔ no a wɔtumi gyina no emergency mu, nanso ɛntumi nnya anaa nsesa users sika.

disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Yɛsrɛ wo, kenkan disclaimer yi yie ansa na woadi Freedom Bridge dwuma.

noInvestmentAdvice.title: Ennyɛ Investment Advice
noInvestmentAdvice.content: Nsɛm a ɛwɔ Freedom Bridge no nyɛ investment, financial, trading, anaa advice foforo biara. Ɛnsɛ sɛ wofa no saa. Freedom Bridge ntu fo sɛ wotɔ, wotɔn, anaa wokura cryptocurrency biara. Yɛ woara wo nhwehwɛmu na kasa kyerɛ wo financial advisor ansa na woasi gyinae biara.

risksOfUse.title: Risks a Ɛwɔ Mu
risksOfUse.content:
Cryptocurrency markets ngyina faako. Sɛ wodi Freedom Bridge dwuma a, wogye tom sɛ:

• Smart contracts betumi anya bugs a ɛma sika yera
• Cross-chain bridges wɔ risks te sɛ oracle failures, validator issues, ne network congestion
• Token values betumi asesa kɛse na wobɛtumi ahwere wo sika
• Transactions wɔ blockchain so ntumi nsan akyi
• Network fees ne gas costs nyɛ yɛn na yɛhwɛ so

noWarranties.title: Warranties Nni Hɔ
noWarranties.content: Wɔde Freedom Bridge ma "sɛnea ɛte" a warranties biara nni ho. Yɛnhyɛ bɔ sɛ service no renhaw, ɛbɛyɛ safe, anaa mfomso biara remma. Yɛnhyɛ bɔ sɛ nsɛm a yɛde ma no yɛ nokware anaa ɛyɛ pɛ.

limitationOfLiability.title: Asodi
limitationOfLiability.content: Sɛnea mmara ma kwan no, Freedom Bridge, developers, contributors, ne affiliates nni asodi wɔ sika a wobɛhwere, data a ebewu, anaa cryptocurrency assets a ɛbeyera wɔ platform no a wode di dwuma no ho.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Freedom Bridge ne third-party services te sɛ Axelar Network di dwuma. Yɛnni asodi wɔ nea wɔyɛ, nsɛm a wɔde ma, anaa data a wɔkura ho. Sɛ wodi third-party services dwuma a, ɛwɔ sɛ wodi wɔn mmara so.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Mmara
regulatoryCompliance.content: Cryptocurrency mmara sesa wɔ mmeae ahorow. Wo na ɛwɔ sɛ wohwɛ sɛ wodi mmara a ɛwɔ wo mpɔtam so. Freedom Bridge nka sɛ services no yɛ legal wɔ baabiara.

dyor.title: Yɛ Woara Wo Nhwehwɛmu
dyor.content: Yɛ woara wo nhwehwɛmu (DYOR) bere biara a wode DeFi protocol redi dwuma. Hwɛ contract addresses, te token biara ase, na mfa sika a wontumi nhwere nni dwuma.

disclaimer.acknowledgment: Sɛ wodi Freedom Bridge dwuma a, wogye tom sɛ woakenkan, woate ase, na woapene disclaimer yi so.

disclaimerModal.title: Disclaimer Titiriw
disclaimerModal.subtitle: Yɛsrɛ wo, kenkan na gye tom ansa na woakɔ so.
disclaimerModal.noAdvice: Freedom Bridge mma investment, financial, anaa trading advice. Cryptocurrency investments yɛ risk.
disclaimerModal.risks: Sɛ wodi platform yi dwuma a, wogye tom sɛ smart contracts betumi anya mfomso, cross-chain bridges wɔ risks, na transactions ntumi nsan akyi.
disclaimerModal.dyor: Yɛ woara wo nhwehwɛmu (DYOR) na fa sika a wobɛtumi ahwere di dwuma.
disclaimerModal.fullDisclaimer: Hwɛ nea ɛka ho nyinaa wɔ

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Antumi ansesa network. Sesa wɔ wo wallet mu.
common.unableToDetermineGas: Antumi anhu Axelar gas a wɔbɛtua
